name: Nuklear Strike
description:
Play it here: https://www.ghhnet.de/InfoQ2Phy/g08/, or download the files below.

NuklearStrike is a Turn-Based Strategy game, which is fairly simple but fun. Try yourself as a ruler and ensure the survival of your colony! In NuklearStrike you can escape entropy and create something truly beatiful.

 The main concept goes like this: 

  • People consume food, 
  • Farmland (yellow) provides food, 
  • Houses entails population capacity. 

Then they are more advanced building such as a Forester(dark green) and a Quarry(black), which logically give wood and stone. A winning conditioned monument will follow in the near future.

This game is still in heavy development, so don't expect too much and have fun ;)
